creatives.headline: Uncover the Truth: Cambodia's Horrifying Past
creatives.description: Join us as we delve into one of the most brutal and bloody revolutions in history. In 1975, the Khmer Rouge took over Cambodia, leading to the deaths of over 2 million people. Discover the stories of survivors like Bo Meng, and learn about the enigmatic figure Pol Pot. Don't miss this hard-hitting investigation.
creatives.call_to_action: Watch now and share this video with your friends to spread awareness.
video_snippets: Surviving the Killing Fields: Bo Meng's Story

suggestions: Shorter CTAs typically drive better conversion rates
